sentences.sContent: An overpass is being put up at the corner of the street.
sentences.sContent_eng: An overpass is being put up at the corner of the street.
sentences.sCn: 在那条街的拐角处正在建起一个过街天桥。

sentences.sContent: The force of the crash was so strong that the roof of one car flew into the air and landed on an overpass above the tracks.
sentences.sContent_eng: The force of the crash was so strong that the roof of one car flew into the air and landed on an overpass above the tracks.
sentences.sCn: 撞击的力量如此之大，以至于一节车厢的车顶腾空飞起，落在轨道上方的一个天桥上。

sentences.sContent: Two cargo trains slammed together at a rail intersection southwest of Cape Girardeau, derailing cars that then struck the support columns of a highway overpass.
sentences.sContent_eng: Two cargo trains slammed together at a rail intersection southwest of Cape Girardeau, derailing cars that then struck the support columns of a highway overpass.
sentences.sCn: 两辆货运火车在开普吉拉多西南部的铁路交叉口发生碰撞，部分车厢脱轨，并撞毁了高速公路天桥的支撑柱。

remMethod.val: over (在…之上) + pass (通过) → 从上面通过 → 过街天桥
